entry.title: Bring Your Own Phone
entry.summary:
Vendor: Canadian Car Club
Type: Telecommunication
Price: 30.00 - 88.00 (7 variants)

No contract - Bring your own unlocked device and start saving with Canadian Car Club Mobile. 
Option to importing existing phone number.
$10 - 1 time Sim Card Fee applies*

Rate Plans

Voice only - $30/ Month Unlimited Voice Can-Can
Voice & Data - $48 - Unlimited Voice & text, Can-Can, Can-US LD- 3MB data
Voice & Data - $53 - Unlimited Voice & text, Can-Can, Can-US LD - 5MB data
Voice & Data - $58 - Unlimited Voice & text, Can-Can, Can-US LD- 7MB
Voice & Data - $68 - Unlimited Voice & text, Can-Can, Can-US LD - 10MB
Voice & Data - $78 - Unlimited Voice & text, Can-Can, Can-US LD - 13MB
Voice & Data - $88 - Unlimited Voice & text, Can-Can, Can-US LD - 16MB

entry.title: Annual Prepaid Data SIM Cards
entry.summary:
Vendor: iLeague
Type: Telecommunication
Price: 102.00 - 365.00 (4 variants)

Our extended annual data plans are unique and offer you the freedom to pay once annually for your data eliminating monthly bills and hassles.

SIM cards provided are on Rogers - Canada's Largest Wireless Network. This gives you access to fast, reliable LTE connections almost anywhere across the country.

 

Details:

Prepay for data via credit card or e-transfer before receiving your SIM, charges are one-time

1-year window to use data upon activation

Data broken up by volume monthly

New Activation fee $0

Re-Activation fee n/a

Deactivation fee $ n/a

Shipping and HST extra on all plans

 

Terms of Use:

Data only SIMs - does not include voice or text

No refunds once 10MB of data has been used

Data is capped and shuts down (monthly) upon reaching your purchased data limit

For full terms and conditions, visit website www.ileaguewireless.com

 

FAQs

entry.title: Monthly Prepaid Data Sim Cards
entry.summary:
Vendor: iLeague
Type: Telecommunication
Price: 15.00 - 160.00 (5 variants)

Our monthly prepaid Service gives you flexibility from long term contracts, complex billing, and costly overages. You pay for what you use only.

 

Sim cards provided are on Rogers - Canada's largest wireless network. This gives you access to fast, reliable LTE connections almost anywhere across the country.


Details: 

Prepay for data via credit card or e-transfer before receiving your SIM

30-day window to use data upon activation

New Activation fee $0

Re-activation fee $5.00 (if not active for 30 days or more)

Deactivation fee $0

Shipping and HST extra on all plans


Terms of Use:

Data only SIMs - does not include voice or text

No refunds once 10MB of data has been used

Data is capped and shuts down upon reaching your purchased data limit within 30 days

For full terms and conditions, visit website: www.ileaguewireless.com

 

FAQs
